thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 17 of 539
thread.title: Melanie

author: Melanie
title: Melanie
text: We went to a boutique and my daughter found the perfect dress for prom. Problem was they had it marked for $924. They were running a sale and would go down to 450 but that was it. I took the model info down and looked it up online as soon as we left. Promgirl.com had the exact dress, with only 1 left , and exactly in my daughters size..on sale..for $199! You made 1 teenager extremely happy not to mention this mom for an excellent price! Thank you, thank you, thank you!
